## ElementCSSBoxDimensions.horizontalScrollbarWidth property

The width of the horizontal scrollbar.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
horizontalScrollbarWidth: number;
```

## Remarks

In the CSS Box model, scrollbars are part of the content box.
